description: APPLICATION FOR PROPOSED ROOF EXTENSION WITH 2 REAR JULIET BALCONIES, TWO STOREY FRONT AND REAR EXTENSIONS AND 2 X SIDE DORMERS AND THE CONVERSION OF THE EXISTING GARAGE INTO A HABITABLE SPACE
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Commencement of development (Full Permission) - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans 
Drawing no. PA-3-09/Rev B (Proposed Rear and Side Elevations Plan Amended) Dated 26/06/2023 
Drawing no. PA-3-06/Rev A (Proposed Ground Floor, First Floor& Second Floor Plan) Dated 26/06/2023
Drawing no. PA-3-07/Rev A (Proposed Site Location with Car Parking Spaces Indication Added Plan) Dated 26/06/2023
Drawing no. PA-3-08/Rev B (Proposed Front & Side Elevations Plan) Dated 26/06/2023
Drawing no. PA-3-01 (LOCATION PLAN and BLOCK PLAN ) Dated 21/03/2023

Condition : 3 - Materials as Specified - The facing materials to be used for the development hereby permitted shall be those specified in the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - Construction Times - No demolition or construction work or ancillary activities such as deliveries shall take place before 8am or after 6pm Mondays - Fridays inclusive, before 8am or after 1pm on Saturdays or at any time on Sundays or Bank Holidays.

Condition : 5 - No Use of Flat Roof  - Access to the flat roof of the development hereby permitted shall be for maintenance or emergency purposes only, and the flat roof shall not be used as a roof garden, terrace, patio or similar amenity area.

Condition : 6 - In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:

   i) The application was acceptable as submitted with amended plans and no further assistance was required.
   ii) The application was approved without delay.

Condition : 7 - INFORMATIVE You are advised to contact the Council's Highways team on 020 8545 3700 before undertaking any works within the Public Highway to obtain the necessary approvals and/or licences. Please be advised that there is a further charge for this work. If your application falls within a Controlled Parking Zone this has further costs involved and can delay the application by 6 to 12 months.

Condition : 8 - INFORMATIVE: The applicant should be aware that the site may provide a useful habitat for swifts. Swifts are currently in decline in the UK and in order to encourage and improve the conservation of swifts the applicant is advised to consider the installation of swift nesting box/bricks on site.
